video_prompt: **Video Prompt:** Rain streaks across a city. People move with umbrellas below. Neon lights shimmer on wet streets. A hand slowly sips steaming coffee, contrasting the indoor calm with the constantly moving, rainy cityscape.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Gloomy yet peaceful urban landscape on a rainy day, viewed from an elevated indoor perspective, with a steamy coffee cup in the foreground. Heavy rain streaks, tall modern buildings with illuminated windows and vibrant neon signs (pink, turquoise, purple), bustling wet street with umbrella-carrying pedestrians, reflective asphalt. First-person view of a hand holding a white ceramic coffee cup, steaming. Contemplative and calm mood.
refined_video_prompt: Rain visibly streaks down, blurring city lights. Pedestrians rush past, umbrellas bobbing. Neon reflections dynamically ripple and distort on the wet street. Indoors, a hand gently lifts a steaming cup, vapor subtly rising. This serene action plays against the active, rain-swept urban backdrop.
